title: Why are most of the lines in dynamite only given to Jungkook? - Quora

response.answer_text: It's because he's the main vocal of BTS. But, it's true that the line distribution in dynamite is not fair. Jin barely got lines compared to jungkook and v but he still rocked it. I hope bighit gives fair lines to jin in their next song or album.
Yeah r8 i also thought abt it. As kookie is the main vocalist and hobi had little little parts only… Maybe big hit wanted jk to have more lines. :D
